verses.first_half: He shall feed me in green pastures
verses.second_half: and lead me forth beside the waters of comfort.
verses.first_half_tle: He shall feed me in a green pasture
verses.second_half_tle: and lead me forth beside the waters of comfort.

verses.second_half: and bring me forth in the paths of righteousness for his Name’s sake.
verses.second_half_tle: and bring me forth in the paths of righteousness for his Name’s sake.

verses.first_half: Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil,
verses.second_half: for you are with me; your rod and your staff comfort me.
verses.first_half_tle: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil;
verses.second_half_tle: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff comfort me.

verses.first_half: You shall prepare a table before me, in the presence of those who trouble me;
verses.second_half: you have anointed my head with oil, and my cup shall be full.
verses.first_half_tle: Thou shalt prepare a table before me in the presence of them that trouble me;
verses.second_half_tle: thou hast anointed my head with oil, and my cup shall be full.

verses.first_half: Surely your goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life,
verses.second_half: and I will dwell in the house of the Lᴏʀᴅ for ever.
verses.first_half_tle: Surely thy loving-kindness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life;
verses.second_half_tle: and I will dwell in the house of the Lᴏʀᴅ for ever
